thread.title: FITZROY, D.

author: FITZROY, D.
title: FITZROY, D.
text: Whole Latte Love has an excellent selection of quality coffees and coffee brewing machines at very competitive prices. I have been a customer for over three years, and purchased my Gaggia Brera Espresso coffee maker from them plus I purchase a resupply of whole Lavazza Gran Crema beans about every six weeks. Purchasing more than $50 results in free shipping. Both their ordering process and customer services, including technical assistance, are very efficient. New orders are typically processed the same day, shipped withing 24 hours and get to my home in Las Vegas in 4-7 business days. i recommend WholeLatteLove to any person who thinks drinking coffee should be enjoyed and not tolerated.
